org.compiere.plaf
Class CompiereLookAndFeel

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.LookAndFeel
      javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicLookAndFeel
          javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalLookAndFeel
              org.compiere.plaf.CompiereLookAndFeel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CompiereLookAndFeel
extends javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalLookAndFeel

OpenXpertya Look & Feel. We wanted a nice UI not the battleship gray based stuff. I guess a matter of taste. : UIManager.setLookAndFeel(new com.compiere.plaf.CompiereLookAndFeel()); // or UIManager.setLookAndFeel("com.compiere.plaf.CompiereLookAndFeel");

Version:
$Id: CompiereLookAndFeel.java,v 1.15 2005/03/11 20:34:36 jjanke Exp $
Author:
Comunidad de Desarrollo openXpertya *Basado en Codigo Original Modificado, Revisado y Optimizado de: * Jorg Janke

initClassDefaults

protected void initClassDefaults(javax.swing.UIDefaults table)
Creates the mapping from UI class IDs to ComponentUI classes, putting the ID-ComponentUI pairs in the passed-in defaults table. Each JComponent class specifies its own UI class ID string.

Overrides:
initClassDefaults in class javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalLookAndFeel

table - UI Defaults

provideErrorFeedback

public void provideErrorFeedback(java.awt.Component component)
Error Feedback.

Invoked when the user attempts an invalid operation, such as pasting into an uneditable JTextField that has focus.

If the user has enabled visual error indication on the desktop, this method will flash the caption bar of the active window. The user can also set the property awt.visualbell=true to achieve the same results.

Overrides:
provideErrorFeedback in class javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalLookAndFeel
Parameters:
component - Component the error occured in, may be null indicating the error condition is not directly associated with a Component.
